description: young man dressed as a woman in a blue kimono with white iris decoration lying on top of and engaged in intercourse with a man wearing a green kimono; tiny man wearing a black kimono and holding a fan, with a large white a red kite, on windowsill; text in cloud at top of image, above couple and on either side of small figure on windowsill
title: Playing with a Dandy (Fukiyaghama, Sakai-shima)
